description: Rei Clancy is http://anidb.net/ch11749 [Kanuka Clancy]`s grandmother. She`s the widow of a U.S. Air Force B-29 bomber pilot who died while fighting in the Korean War. She`s very protective of her granddaughter Kanuka, in fact flying to Japan to get her to resign from the police force. The two of them are very alike, be in in their fighting spirit, drive, or sharp focus.
name: Rei Clancy
